评论详情: Beautiful boot, but a pretty hard footbed and narrow.  I don't have wide feet.  Returned.
Great boot for everyday or an outing.

Very pretty boot but i found it to be very narrow. esp around the fattest part of my foot.  I didnt find it to be particularly comfortable either.  Iwear a 5 and i ordered a 4-4.5 and it fit fine but the 5 would have been too large.  Too bad bc i was wanting a white boot. so ill keep looking. sad.

评论概述: Nice leather creamy colored ankle boot
评论详情: These have a fairly low heel, about 1.5 inches and only come in whole sizes, and feel very light when I walk which is nice. It’s not a bulky heavy boot. The 9-9.5 was snug all over. I usually wear 9.5, preferably in narrow width. I wear a 9.5N in Naturalizer shoes. Since these don’t come in half sizes, I kept the 10-10.5 and they’re slightly long. I have very narrow ankles and these don’t slip when I walk. They run narrow. The insole has a foam bottom with leather lining the top and can be removed and replaced with an orthotic insole. The outside is very soft real leather. The limestone color doesn’t have yellow undertones, but it’s not a stark white either. I feel these can be worn year round. It was difficult to find boots in a white color this time of year to go with winter white clothes.
I’m so glad I found these and purchased when I did. They are so comfy and light weight. Can’t wait to wear them!
I will never wear heels again, but these boots have a heel and they're comfortable. I didn't walk very much though. They're for special occasions.
These are so comfortable and cute.  I get lots of compliments.

Took these as one of my 3 pairs of shoes to Ireland. Ecco is never disappoints in the comfort department. Loved the extra style they added to my travel wardrobe. Yes, I climbed the Cliffs if Mohr in these with no problem, looking fantastic!
Super cute and comfy. Absolutely made well.

The ankle boots is comfortable, great quality and price. The shoe has an additional removable foot bed to adjustment size. I am between size. I purchased my size 8, with boots and booties I usually buy an 81/2 because I like wear thick socks in the winter. With these anke boots I can remove the extra foot bed to adjust the size to an 81/2 for more room. It fits my feet perfect, the removable foot bed is great idea for a person between sizes. Love the  👢.
Lovely stylish boot, you can dress up or down. Very comfortable
…. Geben aber noch etwas nach  Schön verarbeitet
Sono belli ma io ho gia un paio cosi.Grazie mille.Scusami

Ho dovuto restituirlo perché la taglia che avevo acquistato era troppo grande. Consiglio di comprare un numero esatto (di solito per gli stivali compro sempre un numero in più ma in questo caso non era necessario). Non sono più riuscita a riacquistarlo nel mio numero ma i materiali sembravano ottimi e lo stivale in sé molto comodo.
The shoes are absolutely beautiful, the shipping was horrible though. The entire box was crushed and fallen apart when I received it. The shoes were thankfully unharmed.
Sehr gute Qualität und absolut schick. Die normale Schuhgröße (in meinem Fall hätte es auch getan) schade dass Ecco nicht halbe Größen (40,5) herstellt. Dennoch wie immer ein eine sehr gute Marke
